name: Harrr'vest
description:
Description: 

Harrr'vest is a short adventure game where you play Captain Patrick, a pirate whose aim is to harvest a legendary fruit. This fruit can only be obtained on one specific island and only under certain conditions. To find this island and the right conditions, you have to visit different islands, obtain clues or resources, and train the crew. Are you ready to harvest the legendary fruit and obtain its magical power? 

How to play: 

  1.  Select the number of players 
  2. . Choose a scenario. (So far, only one scenario selectable.) 
  3.  With each turn, choose what you want to do this day:
    Sail: A compass will show where you can decide on which direction to sail to. Train: Choose this to get a new crew member.
    Attack: This can be done when arrived at one of the island. A minigame will open. If you win the game, you have harvseted the local fruit of this island. 
  4.  Collect all the different fruits from the islands. Note: Be quick before your fruit expires! After one day, you will loose one fruit in your inventory. 
  5. Sail to the secret island to grow and harvest the legendary fruit.
